SEARCH
Package org.jboss.elemento.logger

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.elemento.logger.Logger
public class Logger extends Object
Small wrapper around console.log that uses categories, log levels, and a predefined log format.

The different log methods delegate to the corresponding methods in console:

  1. error(String, Object...) → console.error()
  2. warn(String, Object...) → console.warn()
  3. info(String, Object...) → console.info()
  4. debug(String, Object...) → console.debug()

To get a logger use getLogger(String). You can use an arbitrary string as category. If you use a fully qualified class name as category the package names are shortened. In any case the category is trimmed, and right aligned. String substitutions are supported, and you can pass arbitrary parameters to the log methods.

The log level is set globally for all categories using setLevel(Level).

The log format is predefined as 

 HH:mm:ss,SSS <level> [<category>] <message>
See Also:
  • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/console/log_static
